snippet.title: Magic and Mayhem: Intro
snippet.description:
Game: Star Wars: Magic and Mayhem
Classic game about Wizardry, magic and mythology. It is very awesome. I recommend anyone to play this. This clip is shown as the intro of the game.

--------------
= Links =
--------------
IGN: http://www.ign.com/games/magic-mayhem/pc-11185
Gamespot: http://www.gamespot.com/magic-and-mayhem/
Wiki: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Magic_and_Mayhem

-= Disclaimer =- All content shown belongs to their respective owners. I claim no property in its content. I only wish to share these videos so players will pick up their old games. Nostalgia is the key word. If you do have any legal or copyright matter with my videos please send me a message. I will be happy to try and resolve it as civilized people.
